Delicious Cake!

16 Jun 2017
  • 1 cup of butter
  • 2 cups of sugar
  • 3 cups of flour
  • 4 eggs

When you try this cake, you’re gonna say “boy that’s cake!”

1-2-3-4 Cake

Look at the delicious result begot by this simple base ingredient set for a cake!

Fried Foods! Oh my!

10 Jun 2017
  • 1 fryer chicken, cut up
  • 1 quart buttermilk
  • ½ cup salt
  • Spice rub (paprika is highly recommended)
  • Flour
  • A quantity of oil suitable for the desired cooking method

When you try this fried chicken, you’re gonna say “boy that’s fried chicken!”

Fried Chicken

Next time you’re thinking about eating you should try to stumble upon this fantastic recipe~
